Name: storjmonitor
Overview: Storj daemon + CLI; multiple-node in template support; Storjstat.com monitor installed.

walletaddress.Name: Wallet Address
walletaddress.Description: Value should be changed to your Wallet address you use for payout.

share_size.Name: SHARE_SIZE
share_size.Description: Example: 500GB, 1TB, 8TB, for each node you start. MAX SIZE=8TB per node.

rpcaddress.Name: RPCADDRESS
rpcaddress.Description: Your DynamicDNS or external DNS address here. If you need a DDNS service, a free one: is duckdns.org

numberofextranodes.Name: Number of extra nodes
numberofextranodes.Description: Storj daemon can run multiple farming nodes at once. The maximum number of nodes per container is number of threads the CPU has.

customnode-directoryname.Name: Custom node-directory name
customnode-directoryname.Description: For multiple nodes this builds your directory, example /storj/thisNameHere#/

deletelogfiles.Name: Delete log files
deletelogfiles.Description:
Delete Storj logs on/off switch.
Enable == 'TRUE'

numberoflogfilestokeep(days).Name: Number of log files to keep (days)
numberoflogfilestokeep(days).Description: How many days worth of logs to keep. Deletes everything greater than.

pathofstorjshareonarray.Name: Path of Storj share on array
pathofstorjshareonarray.Description: Enter location of your storj share folder on unRAID host.
